nodes.beat: Red, a Minecraft player, receives a message from her ill grandmother who lives in another village.
Grandmother requests Red to bring her some potions from the nearby witch's hut.
Red, wearing her red dyed leather cap, ventures out with her horse.
On her way, Red encounters a stranger, a cunning creeper, who learns about her mission.
The creeper manipulates the game's coordinates to mislead Red.
Misled, Red ends up in a dangerous Nether portal.
Realizing the trick, Red uses her game skills to trace the creeper's location.
Red exposes the creeper to the game's moderators and continues her journey to her grandmother's house.
Red delivers the potions and they have a virtual gathering via Minecraft chat.
Grandmother asks Red to bring her a special enchanted book from the stronghold library.
The creeper hacks into Red's game account, stealing her inventory items.
Red notices suspicious activity on her account and seeks help from her friend, a game developer.
Together, they trace the creeper and retrieve Red's items.
Red finds the enchanted book and delivers it to her grandmother.
Red, a Minecraft streamer, plans a live stream to visit her grandmother.
Red's live stream attracts the attention of a game troll.
The troll tries to find Red's location using the live stream data.
The troll tries to manipulate Red's viewers against her.
Red, noticing the unusual comments, uses her influence to expose the troll's intentions.
Red's viewers, united, report the troll leading to his ban.
Grandmother asks Red to install a specific mod on her game server.
The creeper sends Red a malicious mod disguised as the one requested by her grandmother.
Red, noticing the odd behavior of the mod, realizes the trick.
Red, with the help of her game community, removes the malicious mod and exposes the creeper.
Red installs the correct mod on her grandmother's game server.
Grandmother asks Red to bring her some rare blocks from the End dimension.
The creeper tries to gain access to Red's End portal.
Red, noticing the suspicious activity, secures her portal and reports the creeper.
Red collects the rare blocks and delivers them to her grandmother.
The troll sends Red a dangerous link pretending to be a fan.
Red, being tech-savvy, recognizes the dangerous link and alerts her viewers.
Red's viewers report the troll leading to his ban.
The troll tries to disrupt Red's live stream by spreading false rumors.
Red, noticing the disruption, uses her influence to debunk the rumors.
Red's viewers, united, report the troll leading to his ban.

outputs.options:
Stories: Little Red Riding Hood, 
Starts: 2, 
Endings: 4, 
Storylines: 8, 
Settings: Minecraft
